name: TextDrawBackgroundColor
notes: If TextDrawSetOutline is used with size > 0, the outline color will match the color used in TextDrawBackgroundColor. Changing the value of color seems to alter the color used in TextDrawColor
tips: If you want to change the background colour of a textdraw that is already shown, you don't have to recreate it. Simply use TextDrawShowForPlayer/TextDrawShowForAll after modifying the textdraw and the change will be visible.
description: Adjusts the text draw area background color (the outline/shadow - NOT the box. For box color, see TextDrawBoxColor).

params_body.name: text
params_body.description: The ID of the textdraw to set the background color of

params_body.name: color
params_body.description: The color that the textdraw should be set to.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
